role_description: An Ansible role that install VMware Workstation/Fusion on any platform
role_description_full_overview: [VMWare Workstation](https://www.vmware.com/products/workstation-pro.html) (or [VMWare Fusion](https://www.vmware.com/products/fusion.html) in the case of macOS) is a hosted hypervisor that runs on x64 versions of Windows and Linux operating systems. It enables users to set up virtual machines on a single physical machine and use them simultaneously along with the host machine. It is similar to [VirtualBox](https://gitlab.com/megabyte-labs/ansible-roles/virtualbox).
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that install VMware Workstation/Fusion on any platform.
